element.name: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Contains the Path of the Giant Barbarian subclass content.

element.name: Path of the Giant
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Barbarians who follow the Path of the Giant draw on the primordial power of the giants, embodying their strength and elemental fury.

element.name: Giant's Havoc
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: While raging, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Elemental Cleaver: Weapon attacks deal +1d6 elemental damage (force, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder) and gain the thrown property. Thrown weapons return to your hand immediately.

element.name: Mighty Impel
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: As a bonus action, you can throw a creature within 30 feet, dealing 1d6 damage of your elemental type and knocking it prone.

element.name: Giant Fury
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Your rage allows you to add your Strength modifier to damage with all melee attacks. You can make one extra melee attack when you take the Attack action while raging.

element.name: Demiurgic Colossus
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Once per turn, when you hit with a melee weapon attack while raging, you can deal an additional 1d6 elemental damage. You can become Huge while raging.
